20110110040737.000|20110110040741.000|CC1|TO WHAT MAY HAVE DRIVEN THIS    
20110110040741.000|20110110040743.000|CC1|YOUNG MAN.                      
20110110040743.000|20110110040744.000|CC1|>> ON THOSE FIRST FEW MOMENT WAS
20110110040744.000|20110110040746.000|CC1|WHAT HAPPENED HERE BEHIND US.   
20110110040746.000|20110110040748.000|CC1|YOU SAW HIM BRIEFLY IN THE SETUP
20110110040748.000|20110110040758.000|CC1|PIECE WITH US TONIGHT, THE      
20110110040758.000|20110110040759.000|CC1|HEROIC YOUNG INTERN.            
20110110040759.000|20110110040801.000|CC1|HOW DID YOU KNOW TO DO WHAT YOU 
20110110040801.000|20110110040803.000|CC1|DID WITH SUCH CLARITY AND FOCUS 
20110110040803.000|20110110040804.000|CC1|IN THE MIDDLE OF WHAT WAS GOING 
20110110040804.000|20110110040804.000|CC1|ON HERE?                        
20110110040804.000|20110110040805.000|CC1|>> ONE OF THE FIRST THINGS THAT 
20110110040805.000|20110110040808.000|CC1|I KNEW I NEEDED TO DO WAS       
20110110040808.000|20110110040809.000|CC1|MAINTAIN MY COMPOSURE AND       
20110110040809.000|20110110040810.000|CC1|MAINTAIN CALM.                  
20110110040810.000|20110110040811.000|CC1|NOT JUST FOR MYSELF BUT FOR ALL 
20110110040811.000|20110110040813.000|CC1|OF THOSE AROUND ME, INCLUDING   
20110110040813.000|20110110040814.000|CC1|THE CONGRESSWOMAN.              
20110110040814.000|20110110040816.000|CC1|I HAD BEEN TRAINED AS A         
20110110040816.000|20110110040818.000|CC1|CERTIFIED NURSING ASSISTANT AND 
20110110040818.000|20110110040824.000|CC1|AS, SO I LEARNED BASIC FIRST    
20110110040824.000|20110110040825.000|CC1|AID.                            
20110110040825.000|20110110040826.000|CC1|>> IN THIS CASE IT WAS MORE THAN
20110110040826.000|20110110040826.000|CC1|ENOUGH.
